SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.metrics

Class MetricsCron.ProtoWriter

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.metrics.MetricsCron.ProtoWriter
Enclosing class:
MetricsCron
static class MetricsCron.ProtoWriter extends Object
Tiny protobuf writer sufficient for the WriteRequest/TimeSeries/Label/Sample envelope. Supports: varint, fixed64 (double, little-endian), and length-delimited messages/strings.
